name: Watermelon Clicker (Brickle Pickle)
description:
Watermelon Clicker. It is a fun incremental clicker game that allows you to click on a watermelon to get upgrades and different colors.

The premise of the game is simple: you click on a watermelon to earn points, and as you earn points, you can unlock different upgrades and colors for your watermelon. The goal is to click on the watermelon as fast as possible to earn points and unlock more stuff.

But do not trust yourself, the game can be addictive. There are tons of things you can unlock in WatermelonClicker, from new watermelon colors to upgrades that increase the amount of your clicks. And best of all, it's completely free to play!

If you like to play clicker games or incremental games, you should definitely try WatermelonClicker. With its simple and addictive gameplay, we guarantee that you will spend hours clicking on your watermelon. So download the game right now and discover all the surprises it has in store for you.

  • Click on the watermelon to win clicks.
  • Go to the shop to know your upgrades
  • Press "k" for restart your clics
  • And enjoy the amazing soundtrack

What are you waiting for? Click on that watermelon and start having fun right now!
